String decrypt = aesDecrypt(encrypt, key); System.out.println("è§£å¯†åï¼š" + decrypt); } /** * ç¼–ç * * @param bstr * @return String */ public static String Base64encode(byte[] bstr) { return Base64.encodeBase64String(bstr); /** * data[]è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç * * @param data * @return */ public static String encode(byte[] data) { int start = 0; int len = data.length; StringBuffer buf = new StringBuffer(data.length * 3 / 2); int end = len - 3;
